column5: Or maybe they haven't even started yet? I haven't swooped up a good feed of smelts in a coons age .  Does anyone make the yearly pilgrimage to catch and taste these scrumptions?
I would think it should be right around now, I doubt that you missed them. I wouldn't mind a nice feed of them myself.
I hit the lift bridge in Burlington (lake Ont.) for smelts every year with my Dad...  Just waiting for the first warm rain to fall and they should be in there....  Doug
LOL! I thought the title heading read Brits smell! I want to clarify that I have absolutely no problems with Brits and that they don't smell, but that was LOL funny.
